titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend and modify the credit for certain plug-in vehicles.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

bill.summary: 3/6/2012--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the tax credit for the purchase of a qualified plug-in electric vehicle, to: (1) extend such credit through 2016, (2) increase the per vehicle credit amount based upon battery capacity, and (3) allow such credit for vehicles with alternative electrical energy storage devices.
